distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update rebuilds missing kernel modules (KMP) to use 'retpolines'
mitigations for Spectre Variant 2 (CVE-2017-5715).

Rebuilt KMP packages:

- cluster-network
- drbd
- gfs2
- iscsitarget
- ocfs2
- ofed
- oracleasm
notes.title: Description of the patch
